overview.description: Provides 6 Chief Orders that buff construction speed, resource production, healing, and mood

chief_orders.name: Urgent Mobilization
chief_orders.effect: Forces survivors at all worksites to work for 48 hours (Survivor Time)

chief_orders.name: Rush Job
chief_orders.effect: Provides 5 days worth of resources from all worksites instantly

chief_orders.name: Comprehensive Care
chief_orders.effect: Instantly heals all sick survivors in the city

chief_orders.name: Double Time
chief_orders.effect: Reduces construction/upgrade time by 20% for builds started within 5 minutes
chief_orders.notes: Must activate BEFORE starting construction. 5-minute activation window. Stacks additively with pet construction buff and other speed buffs.

chief_orders.name: Productivity Day
chief_orders.effect: +100% output across all resource worksites for 24 hours (Survivor Time)

chief_orders.name: Festivities
chief_orders.effect: +50 Mood, +30 Comfort during Day of City Festivities

construction_speed_stacking.confirmation: WhiteoutData confirms Hyena + Double Time = 35% (20+15), suggesting additive stacking
